attributes.additional_details:
Endometriosis and PCOS cause severe pain, infertility, mental health struggles, and lost productivity. Women face years of suffering, stigma, and financial strain. These conditions damage quality of life and demand urgent investment, awareness, and better care options.

By funding research, improving training, and expanding diagnostic and treatment options, we can improve the lives of millions of women and ensure they receive the care they deserve.
attributes.background: Women with conditions like endometriosis and PCOS face years of delayed diagnosis, limited treatments, and dismissal of their pain. Laws must mandate funding, research, and training to ensure fair, timely, and effective care, ending systemic neglect in women’s healthcare.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Increase NHS funding for women’s health including hubs and access to care
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724227

Give women’s health greater priority in the 10-Year Health Plan for England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732291

Review how to close the gender health gap and improve women's healthcare
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705507
